videos.title: #1 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Flutter GetX Introduction
#2 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Showing Snackbar using GetX Library
#3 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Show Dialog with GetX Library
#4 || Flutter GetX Tutorial ||  GetX Bottom Sheet and Dynamic Theme
#5 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Route Navigation for Un-named Routes using GetX Library
#6 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Route Navigation for named Routes using GetX Library
#7 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || State Management - Reactive State Manager GetX(by using Obx)
#8 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || State Management GetX - by using Obx and Custom Class
#9 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || GetXController - Separating the UI Code and Business Logic in GetX
#10 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Reactive State Manager -  GetX with Controller Type
#11 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || State Management - Simple State Manager- GetBuilder
#12 || Flutter GetX Tutorial || Flutter GetXController Lifecycle methods

task: Get acquainted with the basics of GetX in Flutter. Learn how to implement features like snackbars, dialogs, and bottom sheets using GetX. Explore different routing mechanisms and understand the core concepts of state management with GetX, including reactive state management, GetXController, and GetBuilder.  This day will lay the foundation for your understanding of GetX.
